pullRequest.title: PLANNER-1816 Fix constraint provider for Course Scheduling
pullRequest.bodyText: Most of the changes here are changes to XML data sets, coming from the fact that I changed curriculumList to curriculumSet for performance reasons. (Doing contains() on a List is needlessly costly.)

commit.message: CurriculumList becomes CurriculumSet for perf reasons
Return solver config to its original form

nodes.bodyText: I give you 2900 reasons for why this policy is just dumb, @ge0ffrey . :-)
This class is the meat of this PR.
This class is the meat of this PR.

nodes.bodyText: soft codes tyle: typically we don't leave that empty line there in an empty constructor.
Good rename. The CourseScheduleXmlSolutionFileIO should also be renamed to CurriculumCourseXmlSolutionFileIO

The other test classes are public, so for consistency I'd argue to make this one public too.
Or we make all test classes non-public, as it gives better encapsulation. Something for another issue, in any case.
But let's avoid inconsistency across our code.
same here: test methods in other test classes have a public modifier. Either we remove them across our code base, or we keep them public consistently.

This filter can happen in the right side stream given to the join.
And in fact, it already does it automatically because join(myClass) is synt sugar for join(f.from(myClass)) so it uses from, not fromUninitialized().
already happens because the join() uses from()
